1. termÃ­n: nabÃ­dka Ã— (1 + 1/5) = nabÃ­dka Ã— 6/5
2. termÃ­n: nabÃ­dka Ã— 130% = nabÃ­dka Ã— 13/10
Celkem: 6/5 + 13/10 = 12/10 + 13/10 = 25/10 = 5/2
